title: Blind Tasting with Perdomo Cigars
itunes:title: Blind Tasting with Perdomo Cigars
description: We're joined by Team Perdomo (Roy Kirby and Christopher Harper) and getting blind tasted... While we're getting tested, we test them with the 'Perdomo Quiz." We light up the Perdomo Fresco and Nick Sticks Maduro... But do we know it??
content:encoded: We're joined by Team Perdomo (Roy Kirby and Christopher Harper) and getting blind tasted... While we're getting tested, we test them with the 'Perdomo Quiz." We light up the Perdomo Fresco and Nick Sticks Maduro... But do we know it??
